name: Storm Crow
description: A majestic crow wreathed in crackling storm energy. Its feathers ripple with the power of the tempest.

dialogue.greeting: Isaac... *CAWW!* The thunder calls beyond these clouds. Do you hear its voice in the air?

topics.about_lightning: Each arc of lightning answers the storm's rhythm. Dare you stir these winds further?
topics.about_storm: Look into the roiling sky; sometimes the mightiest powers require a gentle touch to truly guide them.
